application.doc: Importing the contents of a .zip file to the administration pages root

method.name: POST
method.id: Importing the contents of a .zip file to the administration pages root
method.doc: To do this with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Administration Pages Root files resource URI.

param.name: Content-Type:multipart/form-data
param.doc: Required to post the imported files.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file
param.doc: The .zip file (as on octet stream) that contains the files to import into the management root. Note: the file parameter is required. The structure of the .zip file must match the structure of the administration pages root (top level management, error, oauth, snippets, and junction-root with the various files in those directories.)

response.doc: 200 ok Note: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
